trips.title: Mae Ngat Dam | Bamboo Raft & Lake Escape 1 Day Trip

itinerary.title: Day Trip
itinerary.desc:
08:00 Depart from Chiang Mai
10:00 Bamboo rafting & lake activities
12:30 Lunch (local floating restaurant – self-paid)
15:30 Return from dam
17:00 Arrive Chiang Mai

trips.description:
A relaxing lake getaway surrounded by mountains.
Enjoy bamboo rafting on calm waters, swimming, and free time on floating platforms.
Perfect for all ages and travelers looking for a slow, refreshing day.

trips.title: DS100 Trail to Khun Chang Khian | 1 Day Trip เทรล DS100 สู่หมู่บ้านขุนช่างเคี่ยน | เดินป่าธรรมชาติ 1 วัน
trips.location: Chiang Mai – Huay Tueng Thao / Doi Suthep
trips.description:
A classic trail experience close to Chiang Mai city.
Start from Huay Tueng Thao, hike along the famous DS100 trail, passing through forested mountain paths toward the peaceful village of Khun Chang Khian.
We focus on guiding, safety, and local insight, while guests support community restaurants by choosing their own meals.

itinerary.title: Day Trip
itinerary.desc:
07:30 Meet at Huay Tueng Thao
08:00 Start hiking on DS100 trail
12:00 Lunch at Khun Chang Khian (local restaurants)
14:00 Explore village & cafes
17:00 Return to Chiang Mai

trips.description:
An advanced expedition designed for experienced adventurers.
Deep forest trekking, survival skills training, long bamboo rafting routes, and remote camping in untouched wilderness.
trips.location: Mae Taeng & Northern Forest, Chiang Mai
trips.title: Forest Trek, Village Life, Elephant Care & Bamboo Rafting | 3 Days 2 Nights เดินป่า วิถีชาวบ้าน เลี้ยงช้าง ล่องแพไม้ | ทริปเรียนรู้ธรรมชาติ 3 วัน 2 คืน

itinerary.desc:
08:00 – Meet & expedition briefing

09:00 – Trek into deep forest

12:00 – Jungle lunch

14:00 – Survival skill training

18:00 – Camp setup & dinner

06:00 – Morning routine

07:00 – Trek continuation

12:00 – River crossing & lunch

15:00 – Bamboo raft journey

18:30 – Remote camp overnight

06:30 – Wake up

07:30 – Breakfast

09:00 – Final trekking section

13:00 – Exit forest

17:00 – Expedition ends

trips.description:
Escape the city into a peaceful valley surrounded by rice fields and mountains.
Experience local life, traditional food, and scenic views of Doi Luang Chiang Dao while staying in a quiet rural village.
trips.title: Chiang Dao – Muang Khong | Cultural Escape 2 Days 1 Night เชียงดาว – เมืองคอง | ทริปวิถีชุมชนและวัฒนธรรม 2 วัน 1 คืน

itinerary.desc:
08:00 – Meet in Chiang Mai city

08:30 – Depart for Chiang Dao

10:30 – Stop at local viewpoint / coffee break

12:00 – Lunch at local restaurant

13:30 – Arrive at Muang Khong village
• Check-in homestay

15:00 – Village walk & countryside exploration

18:00 – Dinner with local dishes

19:30 – Free time / cultural sharing

06:30 – Morning walk / rice field views

07:30 – Breakfast

09:00 – Visit local temples

11:30 – Lunch

13:00 – Depart for Chiang Mai

17:00 – Arrive in Chiang Mai

trips.title: Huay Kub Kab | Cloud Ridge Experience 2 Days 1 Night ห้วยกุ๊บกั๊บ | เดินขึ้นเขาชมทะเลหมอก 2 วัน 1 คืน

itinerary.desc:
08:00 – Meet in Chiang Mai city

08:30 – Depart for Mae Taeng district

10:30 – Arrive at local village
• Transfer to 4WD vehicle

11:00 – 4WD ride to mountain ridge
• Scenic off-road experience

12:30 – Local lunch

13:30 – Short trek to viewpoint
• Forest ridge trail

16:30 – Sunset viewpoint
• Photography and relaxation

18:00 – Dinner at homestay

19:30 – Free time
• Stargazing and local atmosphere

04:00 – Wake-up call

07:00 – Sunrise viewpoint trek

09:30 – Breakfast at homestay

11:30 – Prepare to return

14:00 – Depart for Chiang Mai

15:30 – Arrive in Chiang Mai

trips.location: Huay Kub Kab, Mae Taeng, Chiang Mai
trips.description:
A highland adventure offering panoramic mountain views and authentic hill tribe culture.
Travel by 4WD to the ridge, trek to scenic viewpoints, enjoy sunset and sunrise, and stay overnight at a local homestay in Huay Kub Kab village.

trips.title: Highland Tactical Camp | Outdoor Living Experience 2 Days 1 Night

itinerary.desc:
09:00 – Meet at starting point

10:00 – Arrive at camp area

10:30 – Camp setup training
• Shelter, fire, basic outdoor skills

13:00 – Lunch

14:30 – Outdoor skill workshop
• Navigation, equipment usage

18:00 – Dinner

19:30 – Campfire session

07:00 – Wake up

07:30 – Breakfast

09:00 – Pack down camp & briefing

12:00 – Return journey

15:00 – Trip ends

trips.description:
An outdoor living experience focused on camping skills and nature immersion.
Learn proper camp setup, equipment usage, and enjoy quality meals in a mountain environment.

trips.id: เลอเชอ เลี้ยงช้าง โฮมสเตย์ | นอนข้างน้ำตก 2 วัน 1 คืน
trips.title: Le Cher Elephant Home & Mae Wang | Soft Adventure 2 Days 1 Night เลอเชอ เลี้ยงช้าง โฮมสเตย์ | นอนข้างน้ำตก 2 วัน 1 คืน
trips.description:
A gentle adventure focused on ethical elephant care and nature.
Enjoy waterfall swimming, bamboo rafting, riverside relaxation, and an overnight stay in a peaceful natural environment.

itinerary.desc:
08:00 – Meet in Chiang Mai

08:30 – Travel to Mae Wang

10:30 – Arrive at Le Cher Elephant Home
• Introduction to ethical elephant care

11:30 – Waterfall visit & swimming

13:00 – Lunch

14:30 – Elephant activities
• Feeding, observation, bathing

17:00 – Check-in accommodation

18:30 – Dinner

20:00 – Relax by the river

07:30 – Breakfast

09:00 – Bamboo rafting

11:30 – Free time

13:00 – Lunch

14:30 – Return to Chiang Mai

17:30 – Arrive in Chiang Mai
